summary: Driven by curiosity, I constantly explore new possibilities and embrace challenges. My journey began with my tinkering with electronics as a child, fueling a desire to understand the world around me and create things from it. In my teens, I discovered art, which became my sanctuary, leading me to discover the power of combining it and technology to transform ideas into immersive experiences./Early in my career, I honed skills in HTML, CSS, and WordPress, merging artistic inclinations with technical prowess. Eager to expand my expertise, I recently delved into JavaScript and React, creating multiplayer games and websites from scratch that showcase my problem-solving abilities and passion for dynamic and inspiring user interfaces./Now, I seek to utilize my diverse skill set to collaborate with like-minded individuals and organizations that strive to make a positive impact. With a proven track record of successful project delivery and a commitment to continuous growth, I am determined to leverage technology to amplify ideas, spread creativity, and contribute to meaningful endeavors.
shortSummary: Experienced and passionate designer and web developer with a background in art and a natural inclination for technology and progress

experience.title: Product Designer and Developer
description: Developed and designed several WordPress and React websites for entities around Philadelphia, ranging from individuals to small businesses and research groups.
Created engaging and informative graphic design, digital art, and illustration to enhance the overall visual appeal of these websites.
Expertise in web design, with a focus on creating user-friendly interfaces that improve the user experience and drive engagement.
Proficient in video and motion graphics, producing high-quality content that effectively communicates key messages.
Adept at working collaboratively with clients to understand their specific needs and goals, and delivering solutions that exceed expectations.
Passionate about using my skills and experience to make a meaningful impact through visually stunning and effective design.

experience.title: Customer Relationship Management Specialist
description: Proficiently coded design documents in HTML for TotalExpert's marketing collateral platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing content.
Managed, assigned, and scheduled hundreds of emails, social media posts, and print pieces, contributing to the successful execution of numerous campaigns.
Conducted archival of thousands of old pieces to declutter the company's collateral database, streamlining access to current content.
Contributed to the development of complex email Journeys that were used by hundreds of Loan Officers across the country, driving engagement and sales.
Worked collaboratively with legal and compliance teams to edit and approve/deny custom content requests, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
Successfully resolved hundreds of ServiceNow support tickets, providing prompt and effective solutions to technical issues.
Played a key role in training new team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to ensure they could contribute to the team's success.
Demonstrated outstanding ability to manage tasks and responsibilities without a direct manager for over a month, showcasing self-reliance and adaptability.

experience.title: Web Designer and Art Director
description: Formulated business concepts for startup nonprofit, providing insights and perspectives.
Researched culture, cuisine, and nonprofits, gaining industry understanding and identifying growth opportunities.
Built custom WordPress website on tight budget, ensuring high-quality online presence.
Designed, created, and posted content/materials using Adobe software, producing visually appealing marketing collateral.
Performed administrative tasks such as equipment management, interfacing with third parties, and organizing documents.
Demonstrated strong project management skills, managing multiple tasks/responsibilities to ensure timely delivery of initiatives.
Identified areas for improvement and implemented solutions to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.

rite.title: Rite
rite.subtitle: 2D Assets for a puzzle platformer game
rite.description: In 2015, I worked in a small team to create the prototype of a 2D puzzle platformer game called Rite. I was responsible for creating the game's 2D assets, including the main character, enemies, and environment.

SIGGRAPH.title: SIGGRAPH Promotional Materials
SIGGRAPH.subtitle: Video and print design for graphics researchers
SIGGRAPH.description: In 2019 and 2020, I was responsible for creating both print designs to be used in official SIGGRAPH publications, as well as promotional videos for the team's research projects. I worked closely with the team's researchers to understand their work and create designs that effectively communicated their key findings.

clickbait.title: clickbait
clickbait.subtitle: a nonsensical, AI-powered multiplayer browser game about writing the news with your friends
clickbait.description: Between November 2022 and April 2023, I developed clickbAIt, a JavaScript game written in ReactJS and socket.io and based on the rules of the party game 'The Exquisite Corpse.' I designed and developed the game's front- and back-end, and it is currently playable on itch.io.
